Address.label: Address
Address.value: 16 GREAT QUEEN STREET,9TH FLOOR EASTCASTLE HOUSE, LONDON, WC2B 5DG, United Kingdom

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Argo Blockchain Plc operates as a blockchain technology company focused on large-scale mining of Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. It mines using purpose-built computers (or mining machines) to solve cryptographic algorithms in the blockchain in exchange for rewards and fees denominated in the native token of that blockchain network. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
